%vlocity_namespace%__PropertySet__c.text:
Participation Requirements

Voluntary plan participation limits

2 to 100 eligible employees: A minimum of 5 employees must enroll (our voluntary plans do not have percentage-based requirements). Dual options require 5 or more employees enrolling in each plan.

Value, Classic and Enhanced plan participation limits
2 to 100 eligible employees: A minimum of 65%textNode% of eligible employees (and no less than 2) not covered under another dental plan must enroll. 
5 to 100 eligible employees: A minimum of 30%textNode% of net-eligible employees must enroll. For orthodontia, a minimum of 5 employees must enroll. Dual option requires at least 10 net eligible employees and both dental plans offered must have at least a 10%textNode% premium differential of the employee-only tier premium. For Employer-Paid dental plans, 2 or more employees must enroll in each option with a minimum of 70%textNode% total participation, and a minimum of 20%textNode% enrollees in the higher cost plan.
